title: Not the right amount of IP removed from my account when i bought TF.
body:
I had 3600IP before i bought {{champion:4}} , and after i bought it i have 977, while {{champion:4}} is 1350IP in the shop? So i think its a bug and i'd like to have my money back :(.

Thanks in advance!

replies.body: Looking into this of you, I see a different balance than what you're suggesting here.  I do see an unlock and everything looks okay on my side.  Your balance may appear out of sync, and a relog can fix that up.  Let me know if your issue still persists!
